pages.text: Smelting Recipe pages can show two different smelting recipes in one page, and they can even fit some text!$(br2)However, if you wish to use a smelting recipe from a mod such as the Alloy Smelter from EnderIO, then it will be up to you to create a template since the smelting recipies were designed to work for the vanilla furnace.
